t: Amazon: brand value 2024 | Statista
s: In 2024, Amazon's brand value increased by 23 percent, standing at 577 billion U.S. dollars. In 2023, the value recorded the only decline since 2015.

t: What are brand values?
Amazon reclaims title as USA’s most valuable brand, despite losing brand value | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: March 30, 2023 - View the full Brand Finance US 500 2023 report here  · Amazon has retaken top spot as the USA’s most valuable brand despite its brand value falling 15% this year from US$350.3 billion to US$299.3 billion. Amazon was previously the world’s most valuable brand from 2018 to 2020.

t: Amazon slips to third-most valuable brand
s: As lockdown-era surges in online shopping began to recede and stabilize, Amazon grew 3% year-on-year, for a total brand value of more than $705 billion in Kantar BrandZ Most Valuable Global Brands 2022 - a massive valuation.

s: June 27, 2023 - View the full Brand Finance Retail 100 2023 report here · Amazon has once again been named the world’s most valuable retail brand, with a brand value of US$299.3 billion, according to leading brand valuation consultancy, Brand Finance. s: In 2024, according to the source's ranking, Apple overtook Amazon's position as the most valuable brand in the world. The technology giant had an estimated brand value of about 516.6 billion U.S.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: The World’s Most Valuable Brand – Amazon Breaks $200 Billion Mark | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: September 30, 2021 - Defending its position as the world’s most valuable brand for the third consecutive year, Amazon has broken the so far unattainable US$200 billion brand value mark, according to the latest Brand Finance Global 500 report launched at the World Economic Forum in Davos today.

t: List of Amazon brands - Wikipedia
s: November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon's brand value tops $400 billion, boosted by the coronavirus pandemic: Survey
s: June 30, 2020 - Amazon has maintained its position as the world's most valuable brand, increasing its worth by almost a third to $415.9 billion compared to last year, according to a ranking by consultancy Kantar published Tuesday.
